items.title: Five missing Kenyan youths freed amid uproar over abductions
items.description: More than 80 young Kenyans have gone missing in recent months, with many blaming the security forces.

items.title: Harris to certify Trump's US election win, four years after Capitol riot
items.description: Monday's session in Congress comes on the anniversary of violence by Trump supporters on 6 January 2021.

items.title: Nicolas Sarkozy goes on trial over alleged Gaddafi election funding
items.description: If found guilty of taking illicit funds from the late Libyan leader, Sarkozy faces up to 10 years in prison.

items.title: Charlie Hebdo marks decade since gun attack with special issue
items.description: The French satirical magazine wants to show its cause is still kicking, writes the BBC's Hugh Schofield.

items.title: Nippon and US Steel sue government over blocked deal
items.description: The companies allege President Biden "ignored the rule of law to gain favor" with trade unions.
